name: Payback Practice
description:
Experiment #7863546384

Good news: The new model does not need ammunition! An auto recharge system has been deployed, that generates energy on kinetic impact.
Bad news: You need to get hit to get ammo...

Now go out there and test the ship!

--------------------------------------

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Fire: Left Mouse button

Green-bar indicates health
Blue-bar indicates ammo
Get hit to generate ammo
With time the ammo turns back into health
Don't lose all your health

--------------------------------------

A game made for Trijam #180 - Theme: "My weakness is also my strength"
Models and UI assets by Kenney (Kenney.nl)
